Blam

Welcome. Blam is a programming language whose objective is to combine ease-of-use, strong security, and interoperability between existing technologies. If you've found yourself here before Blam's been released, thanks for checking this project out. The reason I'm writing this documentation during the devleopment process for Blam is because I hope it can act as a sort of journal where I can document and iron out some of the details as I go.

Blam is intended to be the compromise between a reasonable language anybody can write and an efficient and secure language for users with more experience.
